de.griefed.monitoring.services

Class InformationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.monitoring.services.InformationService

  • @Service
public class InformationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for collecting information from all components and building a JSON string with them.

    • Method Detail

      • setHostInformation

        public void setHostInformation()
        Retrieve all information about the host.

      • retrieveHostInformation

        public java.lang.String retrieveHostInformation()
        Retrieve all information about the host.
        Returns:
        String in JSON format. Returns all information about the host.

      • setAgentsInformation

        public void setAgentsInformation()
        Retrieve all information about the configured agent(s) and stores it in memory for retrieval by retrieveAgentsInformation().

      • retrieveAgentsInformation

        public java.lang.String retrieveAgentsInformation()
        Retrieve agents information.
        Returns:
        String in JSON format. Returns information about the configured agent(s).

      • getResponse

        private java.lang.String getResponse(java.lang.String agent)
        Get information from an agent. If the HttpStatus is OK, the response is returned. If it is not, status 1 is returned, indicating that the agent has problems.
        Parameters:
        agent - The agent to query.
        Returns:
        String in JSON format. Returns the information gathered from the agent.

      • sendNotification

        private void sendNotification(java.lang.String agent,
                              int status)
        Sends a notification,
        Parameters:
        agent - The agent to mention in the notifications body.
